about_the_game: In this short action game, you start off as a prisoner locked up in a jail cell. The game features various obstacles and challenges that players must overcome to progress. As you escape the prison, you encounter guards and other enemies that are determined to stop you from escaping. The game incorporates combat elements, allowing you to fight and defeat these enemies. You must be strategic and tactical in your approach, as you face stronger enemies as you progress through the level. The game also features a puzzle that you would have to solve to unlock the good ending. As you progress through the game, you encounter NPCs who may offer advice and guidance, and also provide clues to help you solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. The game is not easy and may require several attempts to beat. Overall, the game is a short action-packed adventure that tests players' combat, puzzle-solving, and strategic skills.
detailed_description: In this short action game, you start off as a prisoner locked up in a jail cell. The game features various obstacles and challenges that players must overcome to progress. As you escape the prison, you encounter guards and other enemies that are determined to stop you from escaping. The game incorporates combat elements, allowing you to fight and defeat these enemies. You must be strategic and tactical in your approach, as you face stronger enemies as you progress through the level. The game also features a puzzle that you would have to solve to unlock the good ending. As you progress through the game, you encounter NPCs who may offer advice and guidance, and also provide clues to help you solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. The game is not easy and may require several attempts to beat. Overall, the game is a short action-packed adventure that tests players' combat, puzzle-solving, and strategic skills.
name: Shapeless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: No

short_description: A short action game set in a medieval castle with NPCs and enemies appearing in the form of different shapes. You must escape imprisonment and find a way out of the castle.
